alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Echols and northwestern Clinch Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nashville to near I-75 At Exit 16. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Homerville, Statenville, Du Pont and Mayday. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
